2. Description of Services

2.1 Africoin Platform

Africoin is a blockchain-based digital infrastructure platform designed to facilitate railway operations, ticketing, and logistics across Africa. The platform utilizes:

  • Polygon blockchain for NFT-based ticket minting
  • Sui blockchain for fast event processing
  • IPFS for decentralized metadata storage
  • USSD gateway for feature phone accessibility

2.2 Africa Railways Services

Our railway services include digital ticketing, real-time tracking, gasless NFT minting, and mobile/USSD-based ticket purchases.

5.3 Gasless Transactions
